Message.Msg: Blah Blah Blah. I don't take you or the paul ryan's of the world serious when they never mention cutting the pentagon/military budget by AT LEAST HALF. So just STFU!

Message.Title: ENJOY FOR THE WRATH IS A COMIN
Message.Msg: YOU WILL ALL END UP A RED HEADED STEP CHILD

Topic.Title: Romney Ryan: "Lower Tax for the Rich, Ask middle and Lower Classes to Pay.

Message.Msg: unfortunately, the majority of public repeat the "snippets" of the politicians and their machines instead of thinking for themselves and researching the facts. Romney/Ryan are not about taxing the poor and reducing taxes on the so called 1%. If you cut off the head, the body dies. If you demonize the people who have taken chances and have improved their lot in life you: 1) give them an incentive to leave (look at France); 2) tell those who have not taken chances as of yet that is issn't worth it because the government will just take it and redistribute it. This country was founded on providing opportunities (not handouts) to its citizens. There is a BIG difference between helping others by teaching them to fish and it is quite another to fish for them and hand it to them. The first supports ambition while the second promotes welfare states (or socialism). the second is used to buy votes and promotes laziness. America, you are better than this..........vote out the present administration..........they have failed and will never admit it. We need substance not oratory.

The Republicans are crying and trying to pass a law that would eliminate the 5% DoD cuts. If you can't find 5% annual waste in DoD budgets, you probably don't have the intelligence to turn on a light switch.

... which happens next January to reduce the deficit unless alternative proposals are passed before then. The "fiscal cliff" contains cuts that are half from the defense department and half from domestic spending... ... even though domestic spending, in the aggregate, dwarfs defense spending in the budget. So are, it's correct to say, given the facts, that republicans have signed off far more defense cuts, on a percentage of current spending basis... ... than the democrats have signed off on domestic spending cuts... on a percentage of current spending basis. Clearly, Ryan's house of representatives have proposed more, done more, and compromised more, over the past year than Obama or Reid's senate has. If you're going to post, foo... do it with facts instead of spin and you'll do us all a favor.

Message.Title: Do not over look
Message.Msg: Take a look at Goldfield-GV-40 cents up to 2.55 in 3 months. Big earning today. But all the chickens are selling.

"He is, in fact, a big fraud, who doesn’t care at all about fiscal responsibility, and whose policy proposals are sloppy as well as dishonest. Of course, this means that he’ll fit in to the Romney campaign just fine." – Paul Krugman in a New York Times blog post, August 11, 2012

You do not win elections by telling people what you're going to take away from them. Herbert Hoover said "A chicken in every pot and two cars in every garage". John Kennedy excited people buy a space exploration a man on the moon in response to Sputnik. Cutting Medicare and privatizing Social Security will not win an election. Obama is a heavy favorite to win this election.
Major international crisis. Play it safe.

... thing we have to look forward to because Obama's balls-to-the-wall government spending will be a favorite of Americans until we hit the wall like Greece did. It's nice to imagine that we're better than Greece and can do it now when the impact on us would be less severe... ... but that's not human nature, which is to spend-spend-spend until it all ends in chaos and depression. Sad, but probably true. Ryan will probably get Obama elected... which will seal our fate of bankruptcy, riots and depression 3 to 6 years hence.
